entry.title: Activity Nag
entry.summary: I'm trying out a month of Digital Minimalism and I wanted some… encouragement to ensure I stick to my rules. One of which is to use my laptop only for specific tasks I know ahead of time, for an hour a day only. I currently already use Activitywatch to track …
entry.content: I'm trying out a month of Digital Minimalism and I wanted some… encouragement to ensure I stick to my rules. One of which is to use my laptop only for specific tasks I know ahead of time, for an hour a day only. I currently already use Activitywatch to track all my activities on my machine, so I wanted a quick script that would(after an hour) nag me constantly if I wanted to continue using my machine. So I made ActivityNag! You can find all the details around Activity here.

entry.title: TIL Updating ZSH
entry.content: To update Oh-My-ZSH, all I need to run is `omz update`. Didn't even realise there was an omz command!
